div: Access and launch the Reference Photopeaks tool by selecting Tools → Reference Photopeaks menu (tool tabs hidden) or 3rd tab.
Inputting the "Nuclide" and "Age" will immediately alter the calibration of the spectrum.

If the calibration is still not accurate, you can manually account for potential shielding by selecting the shielding material from the list of options, and inputting the appropriate thickness. Often this will alter your spectrum such that peaks will fit the isotope they reflect more accurately.

div.ul: Input the units in which the thickness of the material was measured after inputting the quantity. Separate the units from the number with a single space; trouble fitting will not occur otherwise.
